channel.title: [508] plz help me quickly [508]
channel.description:
hmmmm...
I am trying to make server like everybody.... but I want some help...... I reached when i open "run.cmd" it works and i got "starting server on port: 43594" ok i want a client ... i saw much ppl have ".no-ip.org, info or biz" i have "testscape222.no-ip.biz" how does the made that ........ plz help me asap i have got the palidino76 how can i make it work when i open the ip changer and write the no-ip... plz help help help help help help :| :| :| :|

item.title: [508] plz help me quickly [508]
item.dc:creator: @sindbad sindbad
item.description:
@sindbad wrote:

guyz i dont understand … sorry i am noob … btw i made the client but wht u meant by the 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1???
i have no-ip[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 02, 2009, 12:46:49 pm[/size][hr]i want a client… i have a noob client named blazex…
i want any1 help… give me a link and i download it and when i edit the run.cmd and make the jdk ver…
it works … but no1 can connect to my server … i want to make ppl connect to me and play in my server…
plz help me plz plz i beg u ppl … if u want see this server i want it :p… "jewscape.no-ip.biz[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 02, 2009, 12:54:05 pm[/size][hr]…

item.title: [508] plz help me quickly [508]
item.dc:creator: @Scarf_Ahoy Scarf Ahoy
item.description:
@Scarf_Ahoy wrote:

0.0.0.0 is the same as 127.0.0.1… But you have to run the server before the client with 508’s.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] plz help me quickly [508]
item.dc:creator: @OmarM OmarM
item.description:
@OmarM wrote:

First try if the server is working. Putt in the server field “127.0.0.1”.

item.title: [508] plz help me quickly [508]
item.dc:creator: @Scarf_Ahoy Scarf Ahoy
item.description:
@Scarf_Ahoy wrote:

Have you portforwarded? Have you got No-Ip? if you do try logging in as 0.0.0.0 E.I Local host.
